name: Add or update interaction restrictions for a repository

previews.name: sombra
previews.description:
**Note:** The Interactions API is currently in public preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-12-18-interactions-preview) preview for more details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.sombra-preview

```

params.name: limit
params.description: Specifies the group of GitHub users who can comment, open issues, or create pull requests for the given repository. Must be one of: `existing_users`, `contributors_only`, or `collaborators_only`.

description: Temporarily restricts interactions to certain GitHub users within the given repository. You must have owner or admin access to set restrictions.
